name: pre-code
description: a vscode extension to generate template code

scripts.dev: pnpm run dev:extension & pnpm run dev:webview-page & pnpm run dev:devtools
scripts.build: pnpm run build:extension & pnpm run build:webview-page
scripts.package:extension: pnpm run build && pnpm run -F pre-code package
scripts.publish:extension: pnpm run build && pnpm run -F pre-code publish
scripts.preview:docs: pnpm run build:docs && pnpm run -F docs preview
